První případ nákazy koronavirem v Česku!: The first case of coronavirus infection in the Czech Republic!
<p>Řešení této situace máte teď ve svých:
You now have a solution to this situation. Remember that:

  • Measures affect the spread of coronavirus to varying degrees
  • It takes some time for the measures to take effect on the number of people infected
  • Clicking on the question marks next to the panels opens help
  • You control the speed of the game in the top panel
Modrá barva značí nezávazné rady průvodc: Blue indicates non-binding advice of the guide. Deal with them your way!
<p>Hlavní zdroj informací o aktuální sit:
The main source of information about the current situation in the state. You can click between four different graphs. But the most important is the graph of newly infected.

After the tutorial, click on the question mark in this panel to read more.
Rychlost hry a základní statistiky (prvn: Game speed and basic statistics (first panel)
<p>Tento panel umožňuje hru zrychlovat,:
This panel allows you to speed up, slow down, or pause the game.

At the same time, you can monitor the value of social stability and the capacity of hospitals.

Pay attention to why social issues are for you. stability and capacity of hospitals important. Click the question mark in the speed bar.
<p>Zde naleznete svůj hlavní nástroj k z:
Here you will find your main tool for managing a pandemic. Active measures are marked in blue, gray means that the measure is not currently in place.

Move to the question mark in the measure panel and read more about how the measure and compensation work.
<p>A tím končí naše krátká cesta po ovlá:
And that's the end of our short journey to control the game. Once you press OK, it will be up to you how you deal with the pandemic. But don't worry, we will try to offer you advice in all extraordinary situations. Good luck!

After closing this window, you'll start the game in the top panel
Vypadá to, že jste získali zpět důvěru o: Looks like you've regained the trust of the people. You do not have to worry about too many negative reactions when implementing measures now.
Lidem dochází trpělivost! Nevěří vládním: People are running out of patience! They do not believe in government decisions.
Vaše volba opatření otřásla důvěrou obyv: Your choice of measures has shaken the confidence of the population. Remember that measures affect social stability. When they are too strict and last a long time, people become dissatisfied.
Pozor, ve společnosti to začíná vřít! Do: Beware, society is starting to boil! We recommend focusing on the state of social stability.
Opozice vyzývá vládu k rezignaci!: The opposition calls on the government to resign!
Pozor, situace je velmi špatná. Další po: Beware, the situation is very bad. A further decline in stability may end the game prematurely. What led to the situation? The high number of deaths calls for tighter measures. Conversely, overly strict measures may need to be relaxed or compensated.
Česko se příliš zadlužuje!: The Czechia is in too much debt!
Hra měří, jak moc zadlužujete stát i kol: The game measures how much you owe the state and how much individual companies lose due to the situation and measures. Very high spending can have negative side effects.
Výše státního dluhu je hrozivá!: The amount of government debt is alarming!
Krize má vysoké náklady. V tuto chvíli n: The crisis has high costs. At the moment, the pandemic costs us almost half of the state budget of the Czech Republic for 2019.
Státní dluh je nejvyšší v historii!: Government debt is the highest in history!
Výdaje spojené s pandemií koronaviru dos: Expenditures associated with the coronavirus pandemic reached the sum of state budget expenditures. Government debt and unemployment are at a record high, and the value of the koruna is falling rapidly.
Hrozba státního bankrotu a hyperinflace!: The threat of state bankruptcy and hyperinflation!
Běžná ekonomika je v troskách, řetězce v: The current economy is in ruins, chains of relationships between companies are no longer working. There is widespread dissatisfaction in society.
Covid zabil {{stats.deaths.today}} lidí: Covid killed {{stats.deaths.today}} people in just one day
Vypadá to, že to není pouhá chřipka. Je: Looks like it's not just the flu. It is a good idea to turn on measures in the top right panel that can slow the spread of the virus. Those who survive the disease will be immune for some time.
Rekordní denní počet úmrtí nakažených co: Record daily number of deaths infected with covid
Stovka mrtvých denně zasévá do společnos: One hundred dead a day sow the question of whether the government is coping. Check the top right panel to see if you have sufficient measures in place.
{{stats.deaths.today}} mrtvých za den, v: {{stats.deaths.today}} dead per day, most crematoria running out of capacity
Takto rychlé přibývání obětí obyvatelstv: Such a rapid increase in casualties shocks the population. It would be very difficult for them to accept more victims a day.
Temné predikce se naplnily: přes 1500 mr: The dark predictions came true: over 1,500 dead a day. The army is digging mass graves.
Více než 1 500 mrtvých denně je na stát: More than 1,500 deaths a day is very bad news for a country of ten million citizens. The company is in shock.
Covid v Česku usmrtil přes 10 000 lidí: Covid killed over 10,000 people in the Czech Republic
Překonání hranice deseti tisíc mrtvých p: Exceeding the ten thousand dead line brings distrust in the government. But for a while, people also prefer to be more careful. Economic activity and the spread of the infection are declining for two weeks.
Další tragický milník: Česko překonalo h: Another tragic milestone: the Czechia exceeded the limit of 100,000 deaths on covid-19
Sto tisíc mrtvých představuje tragické s: One hundred thousand dead represents a tragic world championship and an unprecedented loss of life. This milestone pits people against the government. At the same time, they will be more careful for two weeks.
Demonstrace odpůrců vládních opatření: n: Demonstrations by opponents of government measures: they had no veils, they did not keep their distance
Demonstranti v centru Prahy nedodržují z: Protesters in the center of Prague are not following the established measures. However, their arrest can outrage the public. However, if the protests take place without intervention, there is a risk that a large number of people will be infected.
Nemocnice varují před náporem nemocných: Hospitals warn of the onslaught of patients
Nemocnice mají jen omezenou kapacitu - a: Hospitals have limited capacity - and warn that if there are too many patients, they cannot take care of them.
Pokud překročíte kapacitu nemocnic, smrt: If you exceed the capacity of hospitals, the mortality rate will increase significantly.
Státní hygienické stanice zvládnou v naš: State hygiene stations can track exactly a thousand people a day in our game. If your daily increment of infected people is higher, the trace will start to fail.
Překonání hranice tisíce nakažených denn: Crossing the limit of thousands of people infected every day and with it the fall of tracing can be a significant milestone in not coping with a pandemic. In our model state, it is not possible to increase the tracing capacity.
Tisíce obětí za poslední týden a mrtvých: Thousands of casualties and deaths in the last week!
Kritická situace vede obyvatele k větší: The critical situation leads the population to greater isolation where possible.
Izolace obyvatel znamená, že výrazně mén: Isolating the population means that they buy or work significantly less and are significantly more careful. The disease will spread much more slowly, but not because of you.
Life in the country is returning to normal.
The isolation of the inhabitants is over.
Školáci dnes dostávají vysvědčení a začí: Today, schoolchildren receive a certificate and the holidays begin
Žáci a studenti se o prázdninách ve škol: Pupils and students do not meet during school holidays. The "school closure" measure was activated at no additional cost.
Prázdniny skončily a školáci se vrací do: The holidays are over and schoolchildren are returning to school. Should we expect the situation to worsen?
Opatření “uzavření škol” opět zvyšuje ná: The "school closure" measure again increases costs and reduces social stability. You can leave them closed, but the measure will no longer be automatic and free.
Virus se v teplém počasí hůř šíří. Vědci: The virus spreads less in warm weather. Researchers predict a slowdown in the pandemic
V létě tráví lidé více času venku a šanc: In the summer, people spend more time outdoors and the chances of becoming infected are naturally reduced. Maybe now is a good time to relax some measures.
Chladné počasí pomáhá šíření koronaviru,: Cold weather helps spread coronavirus, say epidemiologists
V chladném počasí se lidé více potkávají: In cold weather, people meet more in small spaces and the virus spreads faster. One infected man can infect more people. It may be a good time to take action.
<p>Několik dní před tím, než dostanou vy:
A few days before schoolchildren receive a certificate, there is an opportunity to evaluate your work in government since the beginning of the pandemic.

In the real Czech Republic, there were 347 deaths of people hospitalized with the disease on June 30, 2020. covid-19. {{Stats.deaths.total}} people died in the simulation.
První vlna může být překvapivá a nepříje: The first wave can be surprising and unpleasant. You may not be happy with how you did and want to try again, then just press Restart . Press Moving on to continue.
Ministr porušil svá vlastní pravidla, na: The minister broke his own rules, shopping without a veil
Pokud ministr po porušení vlastních naří: If the minister stays in place after violating his own regulations, the population may revolt, which means a decline in social stability. However, the dismissal of a minister who is already well-established in his work can significantly complicate the management of the ministry and, for example, vaccinations.
Nebudu se podřizovat bludům. Roušku odmí: I will not submit to delusions. I refuse the veil
Celebrita veřejně odsuzuje nošení roušek: The celebrity publicly condemns the wearing of veils and was photographed in shops several times without it. Part of the media is demanding a fine.
Pokud osobnost nebude potrestána, může t: If the personality is not punished, it can lead to less discipline of the population and a higher spread of the disease. However, punishment can outrage its supporters and thus negatively affect social stability.
Celebrita nenosí roušku: A celebrity doesn't wear a veil
Potrestat celebritu jako ostatní: Punish a celebrity like everyone else
Jeden z našich dodavatelů lékařského vyb: One of our medical equipment suppliers charges much more money than is customary in the industry, but at the same time we depend on its supplies. The change may mean a short-term supply disruption and with it a greater spread of the disease.
Pokud budeme nadále setrvávat s dosavadn: If we continue to stay with the existing supplier, we will lose more money on unfavorable orders. Without these supplies, however, the disease will spread more in the short term.
Zažije Česko první místní volby ve zname: Will the Czechia experience the first local elections under the sign of coronavirus?
Radikální proměny volebního procesu obyv: Radical changes in the electoral process will irritate the population and increase mistrust. If the elections take place as always, we risk spreading the disease.
Nedávná výměna ministra způsobila zmatky: The recent change of minister has caused confusion over vaccination.
Vláda se zabývá možností otevření skiaeá: The government is considering the possibility of opening ski resorts
Otevření skiareálů? Vlekaři volají po vý: Opening ski resorts? Lift workers call for an exception, epidemiologists advise: close!
Zavření skiareálů rozčílí hodně lidí a p: Closing the ski resorts will upset a lot of people and deprive them of popular winter sports. However, opening them can lead to a higher risk of spreading.
Vánoce během koronaviru: Jaké svátky nás: Christmas during coronavirus: What holidays await us this year?
Pro období svátků je možné zavést speciá: For the public holidays, it is possible to introduce special measures (to avoid larger meetings) or, conversely, to grant special exemptions.
Výjimku z opatření velká část obyvatel o: A large part of the population will appreciate the exception to the measure. But more meetings means a faster spread of the disease. Tightening can be prevented by tightening up the measures. But that can irritate the population.
Jak česko oslaví příchod nového roku?: How will the Czech Republic celebrate the arrival of the new year?
Pro období svátků je možné zpřísnit opat: For the public holidays, it is possible to tighten up the measures (to avoid larger meetings) or, conversely, to grant exemptions from the measures.
Povolit večerní vycházení na Silvestra: Allow evening outings on New Year's Eve
Únik dat z očkovacího registračního syst: Leaking data from the vaccination registration system can cause many problems for all parties. If you admit to making a mistake, people will be upset. If you deny it, two situations can arise: either you will be exposed and the inhabitants will be irritated much more, or if the lie passes you, a handful of people will complain, but the nation will remain calm.
Oznámit, že je vše pod kontrolou: Announce that everything is under control
Odhalení fatální bezpečnostní díry očkov: Revealing a fatal safety hole in the vaccine system
Okamžité stažení systému je bezpečná var: Immediate download of the system is a safe option, but it carries a delay of vaccination by two weeks. If you try to calm the occupants, deny the problem and leave the system in place, the vulnerable system may (but does not have to) break down and vaccinations will be delayed for a significantly longer time.
Hackeři zaútočili na systém registrace o: Hackers have attacked the vaccination registration system
Hackeři vyžadují výkupné za napadený sys: Hackers demand a ransom for the compromised system. You will either pay them or refuse them, but the damage will take another week, during which it will not be possible to register for vaccination.
Novinář odhalil masivní únik dat z očkov: The journalist revealed a massive data leak from the vaccination system
Únik dat z očkovacího registračního se n: Data leakage from vaccine registration could not be concealed
Bezpečnostní chyba způsobila zhroucení o: A security flaw caused the vaccine system to crash
Přichází nová mutace viru: A new mutation in the virus is coming
Nová mutace viru se šíří rychleji. Dejte: The new virus mutation is spreading faster. Pay more attention to the number of infected and consider more stringent measures.
Nová mutace viru už je v zemi hojně rozš: The new virus mutation is already widespread in the country. The virus is significantly more contagious.
Testování vakcín v poslední fázi. Státy: Vaccine testing in the last phase. EU countries have ordered millions of vaccines.
Úspěšný vývoj vakcín a jejich nákup nabí: The successful development of vaccines and their purchase offer the possibility of gaining immunity without suffering from the disease. People are excited to see the light at the end of the tunnel. The concern of your ministry is not the distribution, but only the promotion of vaccines. Distribution and everything else will be arranged by colleagues regardless of your decisions. Now it's enough to hold on ..
Zmírní kampaň obavy z očkování proti cov: Will the campaign alleviate fears of covid-19 vaccination?
Je třeba se rozhodnout, zda budou invest: A decision must be made whether to invest in the promotion of coronavirus vaccination.
Investice do kampaně pro očkování zvýší: Investing in a vaccination campaign will increase interest in vaccination and thus its speed. However, additional costs need to be borne by it, and at the same time we risk inciting public officials to provoke the public.
Investovat do propagace vakcín: Invest in the promotion of vaccines
We meant well, but it turned out ... bad.
Každá propagační kampaň v sobě nese rizi: Every promotional campaign carries the risk of failure. It's happened to him now.
Vakcína neprošla dostatečným testováním,: The vaccine has not been adequately tested, the doctor said
Lidé mají strach, že nová vakcína proti: People fear that the new coronavirus vaccine is under-tested and therefore refuse vaccination.
Lidé se bojí. Rychlost vakcinace se na k: People are afraid. The rate of vaccination is significantly reduced for a short time.
Celebrity sepsaly petici proti očkování: Celebrities have written a petition against vaccination
Lékař v USA zemřel po očkování. Detaily: A doctor in the United States died after being vaccinated. The details of the case are still unknown, citizens fear vaccination.
Horečky, průjmy: Občané popisují první p: Fever, diarrhea: Citizens describe the first side effects experienced by the vaccine
Lidé mají strach z vedlejších účinků očk: People are afraid of the side effects of vaccination and therefore refuse the vaccine.
Lékař ukázal pět jednoduchých triků jak: The doctor showed five simple tricks to cure the coronavirus at home
Kardiolog na svém populárním blogu dokaz: The cardiologist proves on his popular blog that the vast majority of people can easily heal themselves and do not need vaccinations.
The vaccination campaign has stopped working.
Tři sousední země překročily hranici 75%: Three neighboring countries have exceeded the 75% vaccination population
Sousední země mají proočkováno a nabízej: Neighboring countries have been vaccinated and offer assistance with vaccination in the Czech Republic.
Přijetí zahraniční pomoci urychlí vakcin: Receiving foreign aid will speed up vaccination and raise the vaccination coverage of the Czech Republic by several percent. Her rejection upsets part of society.
Half of the population has already been vaccinated.
Pokud se teď opatření nerozvolní, neotev: If the measures are not relaxed now, we will never open them again
Kavárník Pavel: „S bratrem jsme si splni: Cafe owner Pavel: “My brother and I fulfilled our dream. We found a great space and invested a lot of energy and money in it. Now we're working on how to pay the rent."
Přibývá lidí, kteří se nyní musí obávat: There are more and more people who now have to worry about their trade and future. Providing special support will cost a lot of money. But if you refuse help, many businesses will not survive.
Diváci si zvykají na svůj obývák a Netfl: Viewers get used to their living room and Netflix
Producenti posouvají premiéry na další r: Producers are posting premieres for another year or directly to the Internet. Kills cinema coronavirus? Operators are applying for loans for two years of operation.
Pandemie vyprázdnila multikina i místní: The pandemic has emptied multiplex cinemas and local halls and there is not much to show. Loans to theaters will save them from bankruptcy, but the question is whether the money will ever return.
„Kousli jsme se. Další vlnu už ale nezvl: "We took a bite. But we will not manage the next wave"
Martin a Petra vedou malou hračkářskou d: Martin and Petra run a small toy workshop. But selling online is not enough to pay employees.
Situace těžce dopadá na drobné podnikate: The situation has a severe impact on small entrepreneurs and they do not have to pay employees. If you don't support them, many will fail.
Krámky na rohu jsou prázdné, velké řetěz: The shops on the corner are empty, large strings add up the profits
Místní podniky nedokáží konkurovat nabíd: Local businesses cannot compete with the supply and transport options of large companies. Providing special support will cost a lot of money. If you refuse help, many businesses will not survive.
Vláda padla kvůli fatálnímu neúspěchu př: The government fell due to a fatal failure to address the coronavirus crisis
Vaše hra v roli vlády skončila. Hodnota: Your government role is over. The value of social stability has reached its minimum, the government has fallen and you have lost the opportunity to influence the solution to the spread of the covid-19 pandemic.
Proč se tak stalo? Jedním z důvodů může: Why did this happen? One reason may be that you have been holding very strict measures for too long. Stability also declines faster as the death toll rises to an unbearable number for the population.
